entry.title: How To Lose a Firefighter In Ten Days Off
entry.summary:
Author: Buddie_Butterflies

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 46,388Chapters: 11/?Kudos: 62

Summary: He walks past them and sits at the bar to order a round of shots, figuring that coming into the group that way might be a good icebreaker. He hasnâ€™t ordered yet when he hears behind him, â€œThanks for the shot.â€ he turns to see Captain Diaz standing by him, and Buck is confused â€œYou're talking to me, Captain Diaz.â€ Buck smiles, trying to assess the situation. â€œItâ€™s Eddie, and yes, you're the only one to buy me a shot.â€ He tells him, and Buck smiles. â€œReally, no one brought you a drink? I am surprised,â€ Buck says honestly. â€œWhy is that, Buck?â€ Eddie asks, leaning against the counter. Was this man actually flirting with him? â€œHave you looked in the mirror, Diaz. Does anyone call you that?" Buck leans in. â€œNot if they want me to answer.â€ Eddie takes a sip of his beer, and Buck canâ€™t take his eyes off him. â€œI look in mirrors every day, your point?â€ he shrugs and stares back. â€œYou do know how beautiful you are, right?â€ Buck lays the charm on thick. â€œIs your full name Eduardo?â€ Â  Â  OR How To Lose A Guy in Ten Days: Firefight Edition- loosely based on it, these two are so in love with each other and can't admit it.

entry.title: all my ghosts are with me
entry.summary:
Author: WaywardGhost

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 14,907Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 87

Summary: â€œYou canâ€™t tell me I didnâ€™t pick you,â€ Eddie says, voice shaking, â€œwhen you never put yourself on the table to begin with.â€ Buck just looks at himâ€”tired, concussed, past pretending. â€œEddie, Iâ€™ve been on the table for years. Jesus Christâ€”I built the damn table. I sanded it, stained it, set a fucking place for you at it. I waited for you to sit down. Do you know what it does to a person to love a life they're not actually part of? To be allowed everywhere but chosen nowhere?â€Or, a collapsing stairwell, years of swallowed feelings, and a fight that finally forces the words out.

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 25,473Chapters: 8/20Kudos: 173

entry.title: The 118 Job
entry.summary:
Author: lifewithferg

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 35,360Chapters: 10/12Kudos: 22

Summary: Maddie exhales deeply, sinking back into the chair as the screens all flip to black, Karen having turned off the feed. She slowly moves to the table, very aware of the eyes on her. Sitting down, she looks at Bobby and Athena, who are both looking at her with a shared expression of mischief. â€œWhat?â€ She asks innocently, â€œI like making sure theyâ€™re safe, is all.â€ â€œMaddie, that was the easiest job theyâ€™ve both done in months. They could have done it blindfolded, with their hands tied behind their backs in broad daylight and have been fine,â€ Athenaâ€™s quick response is sharp, but teasing. _________ Or: The 118 are a team who operate on the wrong side of the law. Heists and chaos are all part of the fun until the stakes are raised when one of their own becomes leverage.

Author: starylighting

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 435,947Chapters: 51/?Kudos: 63

Summary: Bobby and Athena are just two people trying to put their lives back together while figuring out how to co-parent. What starts as a complicated plan to foster kids in need slowly turns into something much deeper. Through the ups and downs of heartbreak, healing, and raising children whoâ€™ve been through so much, they find strength in each other. Over time, their partnership grows into love, and together, they build a story about family, trust, and second chances.

Almost.But love gets complicated when itâ€™s the one thing neither of them has ever had the courage to name. Between bedtime stories, quiet mornings, and the ghosts of what-ifs, Buck and Eddie begin to realize that sometimes family isnâ€™t something you find â€” itâ€™s something you build, one heartbeat at a time.Or:Buck becomes a dad. entry.title: Beneath Your Crown
entry.summary:
Author: tinygiantsam

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,708Chapters: 4/20Kudos: 19

Summary: "I do not belong to you, and I never will. We have a sacred duty to fulfill," exclaimed the Prince, maintaining his distance. They were being watched. "You could," stated Edmundo, his voice barely above a whisper. "You are the heir to the throne, Evan. You could do as you please." "I could never abandon my Kingdom." The words were harsh, spoken with unyielding determination. He sighed, adjusting his cape with deliberate ease, as if to reclaim the decorum he had momentarily lost. Edmundo blinked, taking a step forward, his shoulders falling as he saw the other man recoil. "How dare you?" The royal opened and closed his mouth, unsure on how to respond. "How dare I?" he repeated, baffled. "How dare you run from my touch when I have watched you reach heaven from it?" OR: Buck and Eddie are heirs to two crowns, each bound to their own kingdom. To unite the Spanish and English empires, a marriage is arranged between Prince Edmundo DÃ­az and Princess Madeleine Buckley. Unfortunately for everyone, the wrong princes fall in love.
